thread.title: Playtech updates on acquisition of Ava Trade
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Playtech updates on acquisition of Ava Trade | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Playtech updates on acquisition of Ava Trade
text:
Oct 5 Playtech Plc
* Company received a letter from Central Bank of Ireland ("CBI") opposing proposed acquisition of Ava Trade.
* Will be seeking clarification from CBI today and to engage with them in order to discuss certain issues raised in letter which company believes can be addressed to CBI's satisfaction.
* Update on acquisition of Ava Trade Ltd.
